text: Ngokungangabazeki, ngempela bangabakaMvelinqangi bonke abasemazulwini nabobonke abasemhlabeni futhi abakulandeli (lokho) labo abamemeza abanye esikhundleni sikaMvelinqangi (ababizwa ngokuthi) bangabakhonzi bezithixo, abalandeli lutho ngaphandle kwemicabango futhi abaqambi lutho ngaphandle kwamanga
